summary: The *Foundation* series, by Isaac Asimov, is a classic sci-fi story about the future of the galaxy. It starts with a mathematician named Hari Seldon, who creates a new science called psychohistory. This math can predict the future of big groups of people. Seldon sees the huge Galactic Empire falling and a dark age coming. He comes up with a plan to shorten this dark age from 30,000 to 1,000 years. The books tell the exciting stories of this time, showing how Seldon's plan changes everything.
title: Foundation (book series)
